text: Jonathan Michael Majors (born September 7, 1989) is an American actor who gained prominence for his roles in various movies and television series. He has received critical acclaim for his performances in works such as The Last Black Man in San Francisco, Lovecraft Country, and Devotion. He is also known for his role as Kang the Conqueror in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, appearing in the movie Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania and as some variants of Kang in the Disney+ television series Loki. Majors has been recognized for his talent and versatility, showcasing his ability to handle a wide range of characters and genres. In addition to his film and TV work, he has a background in theater and has participated in various stage productions. title: Jonathan Majors
